Desc.entry: International contemporary art centre which has a varied exhibitions programme that includes work by internationally renowned artists (often UK premiers) alongside showing artwork by exiting new artists and hosting residencies, talks and events. Has an art book shop and free online computer resource centre for access to information about the visual arts across the city.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed-Sat 11am-5.30pm (exhibition times); Tues-Fri 11am-5pm (reception, bookshop and computer resource area outside of exhibitions)

category.entry: ART GALLERIES, ART WORKSHOPS AND STUDIOS FOR HIRE
